title: Total workforce of Red Bull worldwide 2011 to 2018
summary: lyondellbasell 's employment was around 19,500 workers as of 2018 . lyondellbasell 's company goals are to create solutions to food safety and access , clean water , clean air and fuel , health care , and sustainable living . lyondellbasell Company Overview lyondellbasell is one of the world 's leading chemicals , plastics , and refining companies globally .
gold: This statistic depicts the total number of Red Bull employees worldwide from 2011 to 2018 . According to the report , Red Bull had employed approximately 12,239 people in 171 countries at the end of 2018 .
